channel.title: Brand Strength on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Brand Strength on FinanClub

item.title: KO
item.description: score:90 Chances: Coca-Cola continues to make sizable dividend increases and reward faithful shareholders. Genuine Parts, Coca-Cola, 3M, Hershey, and Home Depot have been highlighted in this Investment Ideas article. Several companies, including these five, have been delivering positive news of higher dividend payouts to shareholders lately.

item.title: KHC
item.description: score:44 Chances: The company is set to release its fourth quarter and full year 2023 financial results, providing an opportunity for investors to assess its performance. Kraft Heinz has a strong presence in the US, Canada, and international markets, with popular brands like Velveeta and Oscar Meyer.
